title: Accurate measurement of sulfhydryls and TCEP-releasable sulfhydryls in the liquid phase of wine that contribute to ‘reductive’ aromas using LC-MS/MS
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7
